channel.title: Anyone else think the HEV suit sleeves look ugly?
channel.description: If you don't know what I mean, i'm talking about the first person arms. I personally think they look kinda ugly and... plastic? I know that there's a workshop addon that replaces them with an HD styled version, but It would be nice to see the vanilla model of the suit look a bit more... gritty, I guess. Of course, this is just a small nitpick I have with the game, but I just wanted to get this off my chest. Does anyone feel the same way I do?

item.title: Anyone else think the HEV suit sleeves look ugly?
item.dc:creator: Crypt
item.description:
I wouldn’t have made the HD version if I didn’t. ^~^
It’s definitely one of the more jarring viewmodels, what with the “golf ball” pocks and a texture that appears far lower resolution than it actually is. I think the biggest problem with it is that it seems to emulate the HL2 arm a little which is just in my opinions the uglier design.

Read full topic
item.source: Anyone else think the HEV suit sleeves look ugly?

item.title: Anyone else think the HEV suit sleeves look ugly?
item.dc:creator: Zeroniz0
item.description:
Me too. But I love the gloves by the way.
